channel.title: Bambito on fREW Schmidt's Clog (Coffee Blog)
channel.description: Recent content in Bambito on fREW Schmidt's Clog (Coffee Blog)

item.title: Panama Volcan Baru Bambito
item.description: Sweet Maria’s The dry fragrance touches on brown sugar and vanilla bean smells, along with a nice dried apple note. There’s a clean sweetness in the coffee smells, and the wet aromatics show characteristics of raw brown sugar, and definitely some fruit, but hard to put my finger on exactly what. A honey to brown sugar sweetness is striking in the brewed coffee, and lays a stabilizing groundwork on which the rest of the profile rests.
